entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
